org.divxdede.commons

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.divxdede.commons.Condition

  • public abstract class Condition
extends Object
    This class describe a Condition that can be satisfied or not.
    The method isTrue() evaluate this condition at the instant time.

    Conditions can be assembled to form a more complex condition using basic logics operators like:

    • and(Condition) for an AND operation between 2 conditions
    • or(Condition) for an OR operation between 2 conditions
    • xor(Condition) for an XOR operation between 2 conditions
    • not() for a NOT unary operator on this condition

    Subclassing a Condition must implements isTrue()

    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    André Sébastien (divxdede)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Condition FALSE
      The Condition object corresponding to an always unsatisfied condition that will return always false.
      static Condition TRUE
      The Condition object corresponding to an always satisfied condition that will return always true.

      • isTrue

        public abstract boolean isTrue()

        Returns:

      • or

        public final Condition or(Condition other)
        Create an OR condition that represent the logical operation this || other .

      • not

        public final Condition not()

        Returns:
        new Condition that is the negation of this condition
